ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons ground New Mexico chile powder

cookingTips: Apply dry rub 12-24 hours ahead for deep flavor penetration
Maintain smoker temperature at 225°F; smoke until internal temp reaches 190-203°F
Let rest 15-20 minutes before pulling; this redistributes juices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How long would you expect this to smoke? Would you wrap in foil after bark forms?
